better_vanilla.config.title: Better Vanilla Config
better_vanilla.config.option.remove_modd: Remove the "(Modded)" text from the title screen and "*" from the window title
better_vanilla.config.option.creepers_ig: Makes creepers blow up when they catch fire
better_vanilla.config.option.creepers_de: Makes creepers stop exploding when they are in water
better_vanilla.config.option.infinity_pl: Makes the infinity and mending enchantments work together
better_vanilla.config.option.bookshelves: Make bookshelves store books that you can take and put back
better_vanilla.config.option.stonecutter: Make stonecutters deal damage when you step on them
better_vanilla.config.option.campfires_s: Make campfires set you on fire when you step on them
better_vanilla.config.option.disable_cus: Disables the custom bookshelf block entirely (May help with server issues) (Requires restart)
